name: Check for missing
description:
Check for missing values within a group of variables tagged with the same parameter @CHECKMISSING=parameter.
The parameter is the field name of the [variable] that will be hidden if no empty values are found.

action-tags.description:
Tag variables to check for missing values.
Specify the variable you wish to hide as the parameter.
The field specified by the parameter will be hidden with @HIDDEN only if all variables with the same parameter are not empty.
Example: @CHECKMISSING=field_to_hide
